entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character, described as having his nose broken by Malfoy earlier in the text.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a friend of Harry's, described as looking cold and distant while walking to the stadium.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a friend of Harry's, mentioned in the context of Hermione not wishing him good luck.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a character who broke Harry's nose earlier in the text.

entities.name: gryffindor house
entities.description: Gryffindor house is mentioned as having many students participating in the trials, from first-years to seventh-years.

entities.name: hogwarts express
entities.description: The Hogwarts Express is mentioned as a place where Harry met Cormac McLaggen earlier.

entities.name: cormac mclaggen
entities.description: Cormac McLaggen is introduced as the Keeper, described as being confident and having a large build.

relationships.description: Malfoy broke Harry's nose earlier in the text, as mentioned in the first sentence.
Hermione did not wish Ron good luck before departing to find a place in the stands, as mentioned in the second sentence.
Harry met Cormac McLaggen on the Hogwarts Express earlier, as mentioned in the seventh sentence.
